001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.connector;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.config.DatabaseConfiguration;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.config.DbType;
005import io.cyborgcode.roa.db.log.LogDb;
006import java.sql.Connection;
007import java.sql.DriverManager;
008import java.sql.SQLException;
009import java.util.Collections;
010import java.util.HashSet;
011import java.util.Map;
012import java.util.Set;
013import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
014import org.springframework.stereotype.Component;
015
016/**
017 * Manages database connections and driver registrations.
018 *
019 * <p>This service handles database connections by registering drivers,
020 * creating new connections, and caching them for reuse. It supports
021 * multiple database types and ensures efficient connection management.
022 *
023 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
024 */
025@Component
026public class BaseDbConnectorService {
027
028   private static final Map<String, Connection> connectionMap = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
029   private static final Set<DbType<?>> registeredTypes = Collections.synchronizedSet(new HashSet<>());
030
031   /**
032    * Retrieves or creates a database connection based on the provided configuration.
033    *
034    * @param dbConfig The database configuration.
035    * @return A {@link Connection} instance for the specified database.
036    */
037   public Connection getConnection(DatabaseConfiguration dbConfig) {
038      DbType<?> dbType = dbConfig.getDbType();
039      registerDriverIfNecessary(dbType);
040      String url = buildConnectionUrl(dbConfig);
041      return connectionMap.computeIfAbsent(url, u -> createConnection(u, dbConfig));
042   }
043
044   /**
045    * Registers a database driver if it has not been registered before.
046    *
047    * @param dbType The database type.
048    */
049   private void registerDriverIfNecessary(DbType<?> dbType) {
050      if (!registeredTypes.contains(dbType)) {
051         synchronized (registeredTypes) {
052            if (!registeredTypes.contains(dbType)) {
053               try {
054                  DriverManager.registerDriver(dbType.driver());
055                  registeredTypes.add(dbType);
056                  LogDb.info("Registered database driver for type: {}", dbType);
057               } catch (SQLException e) {
058                  throw new IllegalStateException("Failed to register database driver for type: " + dbType, e);
059               }
060            }
061         }
062      }
063   }
064
065   /**
066    * Constructs the connection URL for the database.
067    *
068    * @param dbConfig The database configuration.
069    * @return The constructed database connection URL.
070    */
071   private String buildConnectionUrl(DatabaseConfiguration dbConfig) {
072      String url = dbConfig.getFullConnectionString() != null
073            ? dbConfig.getFullConnectionString()
074            : dbConfig.buildUrlKey();
075      LogDb.debug("Built connection URL: {}", url);
076      return url;
077   }
078
079   /**
080    * Creates a new database connection.
081    *
082    * @param url      The connection URL.
083    * @param dbConfig The database configuration containing credentials.
084    * @return A new {@link Connection} instance.
085    * @throws IllegalStateException If the connection fails to be established.
086    */
087   private Connection createConnection(String url, DatabaseConfiguration dbConfig) {
088      try {
089         Connection connection = DriverManager.getConnection(url, dbConfig.getDbUser(), dbConfig.getDbPassword());
090         LogDb.info("Successfully created connection for URL: {}", url);
091         return connection;
092      } catch (SQLException e) {
093         throw new IllegalStateException("Failed to create connection for URL: " + url, e);
094      }
095   }
096
097   /**
098    * Closes all active database connections and clears cached connections.
099    */
100   public void closeConnections() {
101      connectionMap.forEach((url, connection) -> {
102         try {
103            if (!connection.isClosed()) {
104               connection.close();
105               LogDb.info("Closed connection for URL: {}", url);
106            }
107         } catch (SQLException e) {
108            LogDb.warn("Failed to close connection for URL: {}", url, e);
109         }
110      });
111      connectionMap.clear();
112      registeredTypes.clear();
113      LogDb.info("Cleared all connections and registered types.");
114   }
115}
